body: Can a mod fix this mistake the date is wrong
body_tagged: Can a mod fix this mistake the date is wrong
title: About my tempban

replies.body:
What do you mean date is wrong?
Excessive Infractions are month long bans for first offence.
If your not happy about it try and appealing it here
replies.body_tagged:
What do you mean date is wrong?
Excessive Infractions are month long bans for first offence.
If your not happy about it try and appealing it here

replies.body: all of them are kicks and warns
replies.body_tagged: all of them are kicks and warns

replies.body:
Doesn't matter.

Staff [temp] ban for excessive infractions because the player in question has had chance after chance and still shows no signs of improvement.

In this case, the player has had multiple kicks and warns (and presumably verbal warns) yet still decides to break the rules, so a temporary ban in this case is fine.
replies.body_tagged:
Doesn't matter.

Staff [temp] ban for excessive infractions because the player in question has had chance after chance and still shows no signs of improvement.

In this case, the player has had multiple kicks and warns (and presumably verbal warns) yet still decides to break the rules, so a temporary ban in this case is fine.

reply_to.body: all of them are kicks and warns
reply_to.body_tagged: all of them are kicks and warns

replies.body: Why would the date be wrong?
replies.body_tagged: Why would the date be wrong?

replies.body:
As Vlad said if you think your infraction was wrong you can appeal it. The date is correct as 10+ infractions gives you a 30 day temporary ban, and there is no need for this anymore.

Locking...
